greetings.resetPassword: You're finally here 😄. Let's reset your password !
greetings.verify_email: The verification email has been sent.

instructions.signIn: Enter your credentials to access your account
instructions.signUp: Choose your account type and start your journey with us
instructions.forgotPassword: Don't worry we got you 😉. Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
instructions.resetPassword: Enter a new password below to change your password.
instructions.verify_email: We have sent an OTP to your email {email}. Please check your inbox 📬
instructions.create_password: This step offers an alternative way to log in to our system. Feel free to skip this step if it doesn't apply to you.

validation.email: This field requires correct email format
validation.password: Password must be at least 6 characters(1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special character).
validation.confirm_password: Confirm password must match with password

ultimateExperience.content: Join thousands of students and teachers on the ultimate quiz platform. Test your knowledge, compete with peers, and win exciting rewards

categories.content: Discover quizzes across various subjects to test and expand your knowledge

scienceTech.name: Science & Tech
scienceTech.description: Dive into the wonders of science and technology — quizzes that spark curiosity and challenge your mind!

mathematics.name: Mathematics
mathematics.description: Crunch numbers, crack puzzles, and prove your math mastery with our fun challenges!

chemistry.name: Chemistry
chemistry.description: Mix knowledge and curiosity — test your skills in the world of atoms, elements, and reactions!

biology.name: Biology
biology.description: Explore life’s mysteries — from cells to ecosystems — with quizzes that bring biology to life!

generalKnowledge.name: General Knowledge
generalKnowledge.description: Show off your smarts across a variety of topics — fun, fast, and full of surprises!

currentAffairs.name: Current Affairs
currentAffairs.description: Stay sharp and up-to-date — test your knowledge of what’s happening in the world right now!

features.content: Access a wide range of subject-based quizzes designed to challenge your knowledge and help you grow.

personalizedLearning.name: Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Adaptive quizzes that adjust to your knowledge level and learning pace

rewardSystem.name: Reward System
rewardSystem.description: Earn points, badges, and real rewards for your achievements

teacherDashboard.name: Teacher Dashboard
teacherDashboard.description: Comprehensive tools for educators to create and manage quizzes

progressTracking.name: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Track your growth with detailed progress reports and analytics

competitiveLeaderboards.name: Competitive Leaderboards
competitiveLeaderboards.description: Compete with peers and climb the ranks in various categories

mobileFriendly.name: Mobile Friendly
mobileFriendly.description: Access your quizzes anytime, anywhere on any device

banner.title: Ready to Start Your Great Journey?
banner.content: Join thousands of students and teachers. Sign up today and get access to all features

exam_result.allow_review: Allow student to review after submit:

ERROR_CODE.NUMBER_OF_QUESTION_EXCEED_LIMIT: Number of questions exceeded the allowed limit
ERROR_CODE.PASSWORD_RESET_CODE_FAILED_TOO_MANY: Too many failed reset code attempts
ERROR_CODE.IDENTITY_LOGIN_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED: Login is already associated with another account
ERROR_CODE.IDENTITY_USER_ALREADY_IN_ROLE: User is already in this role
ERROR_CODE.IDENTITY_USER_NOT_IN_ROLE: User is not in this role
ERROR_CODE.NOT_FOUND_TEACHER_OR_OWNER_IN_CLASS: Teacher or owner not found in class
ERROR_CODE.QUESTION_SET_NOT_FOUND_IN_CLASS: Question set not found in class
ERROR_CODE.USER_NOT_ACCESS_TO_QUESTION_SET: User does not have access to this question set
ERROR_CODE.USER_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSION_IN_FOLDER: User does not have permission in this folder
ERROR_CODE.MAX_ATTEMPT_IN_THIS_TEST: Maximum attempt reached in this test.
ERROR_CODE.NOT_YET_TIME_TO_OPEN_TEST: Not yet time to open the test
ERROR_CODE.USER_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSION_IN_TEST_TEMPLAT: User does not have permission in this test template
ERROR_CODE.USER_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSION_IN_TEST: User does not have permission in this test
ERROR_CODE.NOT_SUBMITTED_CAN_NOT_VIEW: Cannot view because it is not submitted
ERROR_CODE.TEST_TEMPLATE_ALREADY_EXISTS_IN_FOLDER: Test template already exists in this folder.
ERROR_CODE.USER_NOT_HAVE_PERMISSION_IN_COMMENT: User does not have permission in this comment

message.have_no_answer: Question {index} must have at least one correct answer
message.minimum_options: Each question must have at least 2 options
message.maximum_options: Each question must have at most 10 options
message.invalid_time_range: Start time and end time must be at least {time_limit} minutes (time limit) apart and start time must be after current time.
message.invalid_reference: Please enter a reference for the document citation.
message.minimun_question_type: At least one question type must be selected.
message.failed_to_get_cost: Failed to calculate cost to generate file structure.
